Hi, I've had a great experience with Dr. Shamin Indorewala, she is associated with Ummeed foundation, an NGO for adolescent mental health and also practices as a psychologist independently. She's slightly expensive but she has helped me in getting practical solutions as well as getting to the crux of my diagnosed Clinical Depression and GAD. I've been her client for just 6 months now but it has made a huge difference. DM me for any contact details if reqd, happy to help!
